#Loading necessary packages
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

#Reading in the mussel size data
```{r}
mussel_size_data <- read.csv("data/Copy of MusselSizeAll.csv")
```


#Viewing the entire dataset to get an idea of what it looks like
```{r}
View(mussel_size_data)
```

#Using ncol to find number of columns/variables and n row to find number of rows or values
```{r}
ncol(mussel_size_data)
```
```{r}
nrow(mussel_size_data)
```


#Using glimpse to view the columns/variables better
```{r}
glimpse(mussel_size_data)
```
